verses.verse: The <S%G4245>elder<s%> unto the <S%G1588>elect<s%> <S%G2959>lady<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%>, <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> they that <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%>;

Grace <S%G5485><s%>, <S%G1656>mercy<s%>, <S%G1515>peace<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>, <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>.

I <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> <S%G3029>greatly<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I have <S%G2147>found<s%> certain <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G4043>walking<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G225>truth<s%>, even <S%G2531>as<s%> we <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> I <S%G2065>beseech<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>, <S%G2959>lady<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> though I <S%G1125>wrote<s%> to <S%G4671>thee<s%> a <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> we <S%G25>love<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G26>love<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> we should <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1785>commandments<s%>. <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%>, <S%G2443>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> ye <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%>, that ye should <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4108>deceivers<s%> are gone <S%G1525>forth<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>, even they that <S%G3670>confess<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>. <S%G3778>This<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G4108>deceiver<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G500>antichrist<s%>.

Look <S%G991><s%> to <S%G1438>yourselves<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> ye <S%G622>lose<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the things <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G2038>wrought<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> that ye <S%G618>receive<s%> <S%G3408>a<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> <S%G3408>reward<s%>.

Whosoever <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3845>goeth<s%> onward <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3306>abideth<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1322>teaching<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>: he that <S%G3306>abideth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1322>teaching<s%>, <S%G5547><s%> the same <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%>.

Having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> things to <S%G1125>write<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, I <S%G1014>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> write them <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G5489>paper<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3188>ink<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> I <S%G1679>hope<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G4750>face<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4750>face<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5209>your<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> may <S%G5600>be<s%> made <S%G4137>full<s%>.
